newsitem.title: UK: European vegetable oils close mixed in slow trade.
newsitem.headline: European vegetable oils close mixed in slow trade.

text.p: Closing European vegetable oil prices were mixed on Friday with the market still in holiday mood.
Traders said many players were still absent after Thursday's holiday in several European and Eastern conutries.
"A lot of people are turning Thursday's holiday into a long weekend," said one.

Lower Chicago futures overnight put soft oil sellers under pressure with soy oil 0.75 to two guilders lower and rape oil 0.50 to one guilder down after Feb/Apr 107.50 guilders a 100 kilos fob ex-mill.
Crude palm oil cif Europe was offered unchanged to $2.50 down after May traded at $560 and Jun at $555 a tonne cif.
Among products RBD palm oil was unchanged to $2.50 higher while olein was unchanged with no further business reported during the afternoon.
Coconut oil sellers backed off during the afternoon and by the close offers were unchanged to $5 up after Jun/Jul traded at $665 a tonne cif.
Palmkernel oil offers were $5 to $10 down.
